chunks.en: [Meal Carve App] Unlock your culinary journey: Free promo codes are waiting for you!
As an amateur programming enthusiast, I developed a recipe app during the pandemic, mainly to meet some personal needs.

On the one hand, I often struggle with what to eat every day; on the other hand, although short video apps have gradually replaced traditional recipe apps and provide a wealth of cooking videos, I find myself needing a dedicated space to store my favorite recipe videos, rather than on those feature-rich short video platforms.
With this in mind, the 'Meal Carve' App came into being.
Its core features include randomly generating recipes and collecting recipe videos from various short video platforms, providing an independent space to browse these contents.
After all, food is about the joy of life and an indispensable part of our daily lives.
This software is provided free of charge and includes in-app purchase options.
I'm sharing some promo codes for you to use here, and you're also welcome to PM me to get more promo codes.

I must admit that the software is still relatively rudimentary in design and functionality. If you encounter any problems or have any suggestions during use, I would very much like to hear your feedback.
You can give your honest review in the App Store, or leave me a message or PM, thank youğŸ™
Finally, I wish you all good health and all the best in the new year!
Software link: https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/%E9%A4%90%E5%88%BB/id1640224130

'The software is still relatively rudimentary in design and functionality,' yet it includes in-app purchase options.

In-app purchase is no longer a basic function. It is recommended to improve the product first, and then implement this function when there is a certain user base and users actually show that they need in-app purchases.
